message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $140?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $150?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think I can meet you halfway at $145 for the product. Thank you for considering my budget.
